abstracts.cdata!:
The Cucuta Water Supply and Sewerage
            Project will consist of:  (a) construction of water
            transmission, storage and distribution facilities, and
            development of a new source of water supply for Cucuta.  It
            will also involve; (b) expansion of the sewerage system, and
            construction of a waste water treatment facility to reduce
            river pollution; and (c) storm drainage improvements.
            Finally, the project will provide; (d) extensive technical
            assistance to EMC for a program of institutional improvement.
